actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide Federal authority for States to restrict the importation of solid waste.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide Federal authority for States to restrict such importation of solid waste as the State deems necessary to protect public health and safety.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to provide Federal authority for States to restrict the importation of solid waste.
